body_html:
@Caenorst are you sure that fused batch norm is implemented on the CuDNN level, not on the tf ops level? It seems that a new tensorflow op would be enough to implement batch renormalization with fusion, no new CuDNN functions are needed.

@jart it seems that it is a reasonable feature request, unless there is a decision to do all such optimizations via XLA JIT
